entities.name: hermione

relationships.description: Peter Pettigrew was protected by Albus Dumbledore, and he took refuge with a wizard family in case his protector regained strength.
Hermione is interrogating Peter Pettigrew about how he escaped from Azkaban without using Dark Magic.

Hermione is asking Mr. Black/Sirius (who is likely Sirius Black, a friend of Harry Potter) about how he escaped from Azkaban without using Dark Magic, implying that she has information or knowledge about Albus Dumbledore.
